name: Blind Harvest
description:
This is my entry for the GMTK Jam 2018. I made it han style (solo) in two days. The theme was to have a genre without a key mechanic. So my idea was for a Run a Jump platformer where you remove the most basic mechanic... Vision...

It took alot of my time to create the feel of the game.... I wanted a fun platformer that would feel good to just jump around... I believe I did an ok job at it... However, that came at the cost of game content, ie. levels... In this version there are only two levels that are very similar with a small twist...

I hope you like it...
